snippet: E-mails that have emerged from litigation against the hedge fund Magnetar "appear to shed new light" on how Wall Street banks and the hedge fund put together mortgage-backed securities that Magnetar then bet against, report Jesse Eisinger and Jake...
abstract: E-mails that have emerged from litigation against the hedge fund Magnetar "appear to shed new light" on how Wall Street banks and the hedge fund put together mortgage-backed securities that Magnetar then bet against, report Jesse Eisinger and Jake Bernstein of ProPublica.

headline.main: Glimpses of Financial Crisis Deals in E-Mails
